item.title: 国行 iPhone Air 本周五开启预定，22 日开售
item.guid: 国行-iPhone-Air-本周五开启预定，22-日开售
item.description:
iFanr learned that the domestic version of iPhone Air will officially open for pre-order this Friday and officially go on sale next Wednesday. 爱范儿获悉，国行 iPhone Air 将于本周五正式开启预购，下周三正式发售。

iPhone Air was released at Apple's autumn new product launch event in September this year, alongside the iPhone 17 series products. iPhone Air 于今年 9 月苹果秋季新品发布会发布，和 iPhone 17 系列产品一同推出。

However, because iPhone Air is a pure eSIM model (without a physical SIM card slot), and eSIM-related services from mainland Chinese operators had not yet been launched at that time, it missed the simultaneous first release with the iPhone 17 series. 然而，由于 iPhone Air 为纯 eSIM 机型（无实体 SIM 卡槽），且当时中国大陆运营商 eSIM 相关业务尚未开启，因此无缘 iPhone 17 系列同期首发。

At the same time, yesterday, the three major operators — China Unicom, China Mobile, and China Telecom — also successively issued announcements, officially declaring that eSIM-related services are about to go live. 同时，昨天联通、移动、电信三大运营商也纷纷发文，官宣 eSIM 相关业务即将上线。

An Apple spokesperson told iFanr, "We believe customers in mainland China will love the iPhone Air and hope they can experience it soon." 一位苹果发言人告诉爱范儿，「我们相信中国大陆的顾客会爱上 iPhone Air，并希望他们能早日上手体验。」

🔗 Related Reading: Just in, iPhone Air's domestic release date is set | Includes Hong Kong version experience 🔗 相关阅读： 刚刚，iPhone Air 国行发售定了 | 附港版体验

item.title: 成都小米 SU7 碰撞后爆燃：车速达 150km/h，驾驶员涉嫌酒驾
item.guid: 成都小米-SU7-碰撞后爆燃：车速达-150km/h，驾驶员涉嫌酒驾
item.description:
According to The Paper, a serious traffic accident occurred on Tianfu Avenue in Chengdu, Sichuan, around 3:16 AM yesterday, involving a Xiaomi SU7 vehicle. 据澎湃新闻报道，昨日凌晨 3 时 16 分左右，四川成都天府大道发生一起严重交通事故，涉事车辆为小米 SU7。

According to on-site videos and eyewitness descriptions, the vehicle was driving abnormally before the incident, even swaying erratically. Some people reported hearing the driver shouting loudly while waiting at a red light. 根据现场视频和目击者描述，车辆在事发前行驶状态异常，甚至出现摇摆不定，有人称在等红灯时听到驾驶员大声吼叫。

Subsequently, the vehicle sped off, with the dashcam showing speeds between 100km/h and 150km/h. It eventually lost control, crashed into a green belt, rolled into the opposite lane, and caught fire. 随后，车辆高速冲出，行车记录仪显示车速在 100km/h 至 150km/h 区间，最终失控撞上绿化带并翻滚至对向车道后起火。

After the accident, the driver was trapped inside the vehicle. Several passersby immediately came forward to rescue, some smashing windows with bare hands or tools, others bringing fire extinguishers, but the car doors could not be opened, and the fire spread rapidly. 事故发生后，驾驶员被困车内，多名路人立即上前施救，有人徒手或用工具砸窗，有人拿来灭火器，但车门始终无法打开，火势迅速蔓延。

On-site videos showed a citizen involved in the rescue suffered hand injuries and bleeding. After firefighters arrived, they used water cannons to suppress the fire and cutting tools to cut open the vehicle body, but the driver had unfortunately perished. 现场视频显示，一名参与救援的市民手部受伤流血。消防人员赶到后使用水枪压制火势，并借助破拆工具切割车身，但驾驶员已不幸遇难。

Yesterday afternoon, Chengdu Public Security issued a police report stating that the driver, Deng (male, 31 years old), is suspected of drunk driving, and the accident is still under further investigation. 昨天下午，成都公安发布警情通报称，驾驶员邓某某（男，31岁）涉嫌酒后驾驶机动车，事故仍在进一步调查中。

Xiaomi Auto has not yet issued an official response regarding this matter. Affected by the accident, Xiaomi's Hong Kong-listed shares once fell by 6.86% yesterday afternoon. 小米汽车方面尚未就此事发布正式回应。受事故影响，小米港股昨日午间一度下跌 6.86%。

item.title: 库克现身上海 Labubu 巡展，获赠橙色 iPhone 17 Pro 限定玩偶
item.guid: 库克现身上海-Labubu-巡展，获赠橙色-iPhone-17-Pro-限定玩偶
item.description:
Yesterday, Apple CEO Tim Cook appeared at the Labubu themed exhibition in Shanghai, marking the first stop of his current trip to China. 昨天，苹果 CEO Tim Cook 现身上海 Labubu 主题巡展，这是其本次中国行程的首站活动。

At the scene, Cook interacted closely with Pop Mart CEO Wang Ning and Labubu designer Kasing Lung, and was presented with a special Labubu doll — holding an orange iPhone 17 Pro. 在现场，库克与泡泡玛特 CEO 王宁、Labubu 设计师龙家升亲密互动，并获赠一只特别的 Labubu 玩偶 —— 手中拿着橙色 iPhone 17 Pro。

It is reported that this event is an important part of THE MONSTERS 10th-anniversary tour. Kasing Lung presented this 'Cook Limited Labubu' to Cook at the scene, sparking heated discussions among netizens. 据悉，本次活动是 THE MONSTERS 十周年巡展的重要环节。龙家升在现场将这款「库克限定 Labubu」赠予库克，引发网友热议。

Labubu, as Pop Mart's most iconic trendy toy character, has gained immense popularity worldwide in recent years and is considered one of the representative symbols of Chinese trendy toy culture. Labubu 作为泡泡玛特旗下最具代表性的潮玩形象，近年来在全球范围内掀起热潮，被视为中国潮玩文化的代表符号之一。

item.title: OpenAI 宣布自研 AI 芯片：携手博通部署 10 吉瓦算力
item.guid: OpenAI-宣布自研-AI-芯片：携手博通部署-10-吉瓦算力
item.description:
Yesterday, OpenAI announced on its official website a strategic partnership with Broadcom to deploy a total of 10 gigawatts of self-developed AI accelerator clusters over the next few years. 昨天，OpenAI 在官网发文，宣布与博通（Broadcom）达成战略合作，将在未来数年内部署总计 10 吉瓦的自研 AI 加速器集群。

The cooperation between the two parties includes: 双方合作内容包括：

    OpenAI is responsible for designing customized AI accelerators and systems, and embedding its research and development results directly into hardware to enhance computing power and intelligence.

    Broadcom will provide a full suite of networking solutions, including Ethernet, PCIe, and optical interconnects, and will be responsible for the deployment of rack-level systems.

    The deployment plan is expected to commence in the second half of 2026 and be completed by the end of 2029.

Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, stated: 'Our partnership with Broadcom is a crucial step in building AI infrastructure, which will help us unlock the potential of artificial intelligence and bring tangible benefits to society and businesses.' OpenAI 首席执行官 Sam Altman 表示：「与博通的合作是建设 AI 基础设施的重要一步，这将帮助我们释放人工智能的潜力，并为社会和企业带来实际益处。」

Hock Tan, President and CEO of Broadcom, also pointed out: 'Our collaboration with OpenAI marks a pivotal moment in the development of general artificial intelligence, and together we will drive the implementation of next-generation accelerators and networking systems.' 博通总裁兼首席执行官 Hock Tan 也指出：「与 OpenAI 的合作标志着通用人工智能发展道路上的关键时刻，我们将共同推动下一代加速器和网络系统的落地。」

It is reported that OpenAI currently has over 800 million weekly active users, widely covering enterprises, developers, and small and medium-sized organizations. This cooperation will further strengthen its global AI infrastructure layout. 据悉，OpenAI 目前每周活跃用户已超过 8 亿，广泛覆盖企业、开发者及中小型组织。此次合作将进一步强化其在全球 AI 基础设施领域的布局。

item.title: Windows 10 今日正式停止支持
item.guid: Windows-10-今日正式停止支持
item.description:
According to Microsoft's previous notification, Windows 10 will officially end support at 15:00 Beijing time on October 14, after which technical support, feature updates, and security patches will no longer be provided. 据微软此前通知，Windows 10 将于北京时间 10 月 14 日 15:00 正式结束支持，届时将不再提供技术支持、功能更新及安全补丁。

Microsoft stated that after support ends, user devices will still function normally but will face higher risks of viruses and malware. The official recommendation is for eligible users to upgrade to Windows 11 as soon as possible; for devices that do not meet the upgrade requirements, Microsoft offers the Windows 10 Extended Security Update (ESU) program. 微软表示，终止支持后，用户设备仍可正常使用，但将面临更高的病毒与恶意软件风险。官方建议符合条件的用户尽快升级至 Windows 11；对于不满足升级条件的设备，微软提供了 Windows 10 扩展安全更新（ESU）计划。

According to the plan announced by Microsoft, users can obtain ESU in the following three ways: 根据微软公布的方案，用户可通过以下三种方式获取 ESU：

    Option 1: Free activation using a Microsoft account (MSA), but requires logging in at least once every 60 days;

    Option 2: Redeem with 1000 Microsoft Rewards points;

    Option 3: Pay a one-time fee of $30 (approximately 214 RMB) to purchase the service.

Microsoft emphasized that if a user does not log into their Microsoft account within 60 days, the activated ESU qualification will automatically expire and will not be automatically renewed; re-registration will be required to restore it. 微软强调，若用户未在 60 天内登录微软账户，已激活的 ESU 资格将自动失效，且不会自动续期，需重新注册才能恢复。

It is reported that Windows 10 has been released for 10 years. Since its official launch on July 29, 2015, the system has become one of the most widely used desktop operating systems globally, thanks to its relatively stable performance and broad hardware compatibility. 据悉，Windows 10 发布至今已有 10 年时间。自 2015 年 7 月 29 日正式推出以来，该系统凭借相对稳定的性能和广泛的硬件兼容性，成为全球用户数量最多的桌面操作系统之一。

However, as Microsoft gradually promotes the adoption of Windows 11, Windows 10's lifecycle is nearing its end. 然而，随着微软逐步推进 Windows 11 的普及，Windows 10 的生命周期也即将画上句号。

item.title: 小红书突发宕机冲上热搜，官方回复
item.guid: 小红书突发宕机冲上热搜，官方回复
item.description:
Yesterday noon, Xiaohongshu experienced service anomalies, with some pages failing to open, and functions like liking, commenting, and favoriting being inoperable. Related topics quickly trended on hot searches. 昨天中午，小红书出现服务异常，部分页面无法打开，点赞、评论、收藏等功能无法操作，相关话题也迅速登上热搜。

Some users said they "thought it was a bad signal, but it turned out the server crashed," while others reported that they "were scrolling and suddenly couldn't scroll anymore." 部分用户称自己「以为是信号不好，没想到是服务器崩了」，也有人表示「刷着刷着突然刷不动了」。

Some users reported that the "Creator Center" was also inaccessible, with the page displaying "In queue, please try again later." 有用户反馈「创作者中心」同样无法进入，页面提示「排队中，请稍后再试」。

In response, Xiaohongshu customer service stated that the reported app anomaly issues have been relayed to relevant staff for handling, and apologized for any inconvenience caused. Xiaohongshu's services had returned to normal by that afternoon. 对此，小红书客服回应称，关于用户反馈的 APP 异常问题，已同步给相关工作人员处理，并对带来的不便表示歉意。当天下午，小红书服务已恢复正常。

item.title: 宇树发布最新演示视频：机器人耍起了功夫，后空翻稳健落地
item.guid: 宇树发布最新演示视频：机器人耍起了功夫，后空翻稳健落地
item.description:
Unitree Robotics yesterday released its latest demo video, showcasing new breakthroughs in complex movements by its humanoid robot. 宇树科技昨天发布最新演示视频，展示了其人形机器人在复杂动作上的新突破。

In the video, the robot not only performed standard kung fu moves but also smoothly executed difficult actions like backflips and somersaults, with its overall performance appearing more natural and coherent. 视频中，机器人不仅完成了标准的功夫招式，还流畅地完成了后空翻、翻跟头等高难度动作，整体表现更加自然、连贯。

The official introduction states that this version has undergone significant optimization in motion control and stability, enabling the robot to maintain balance during high-speed movements and exhibit near-human flexibility. 官方介绍称，这一版本在动作控制与稳定性方面进行了大幅优化，使机器人能够在高速运动中保持平衡，并展现出接近人类的灵活性。

Compared to previous demonstrations, this video places more emphasis on "kung fu" elements, with smooth action transitions, making it more entertaining and visually appealing. 相比此前的演示，本次视频更强调「功夫」元素，动作衔接丝滑，观感更具娱乐性与观赏性。

Previously, Unitree Robotics released a video of its robot being "ganged up on," where the robot, despite being "surrounded" and repeatedly kicked down, was still able to quickly get up, maintain balance, and perform multiple difficult actions like backflips. 此前，宇树科技曾发布机器人被「围殴」的视频，视频中的机器人在遭受「围堵」、多次被踹倒的情况下依然能快速起身、保持平衡，并作出多次后空翻等高难度动作。

item.title: 影石创始人：大疆降价是因为我们
item.guid: 影石创始人：大疆降价是因为我们
item.description:
Yesterday, Insta360 founder and CEO Liu Jingkang posted on Weibo, stating that DJI's recent significant price reduction "might be partly due to us at Insta360." 昨天，影石创始人兼 CEO 刘靖康在微博发文称，大疆近期大幅降价「可能有一部分是因为我们影石的原因」。

Liu Jingkang stated that as an apology, users who purchased DJI products between October 2nd and October 8th can post a screenshot of their order in the Weibo comment section to receive a 100 RMB no-threshold voucher from Insta360. 刘靖康表示，为表歉意，凡在 10 月 2 日至 10 月 8 日期间购买大疆产品的用户，可在微博评论区晒出订单截图，领取影石 100 元无门槛代金券。

At the same time, he also announced that two users would be selected via the "Weibo Lottery Platform" to receive either the "Insta360 Consumer Camera Family Pack" or the "DJI OSMO Series Family Pack." 同时，他还宣布将通过「微博抽奖平台」抽取两名用户，赠送「影石消费级相机全家桶」或「大疆 OSMO 系列全家桶」。

According to previous reports, DJI announced that it will kick off its Double Eleven carnival on October 9, with price reductions on many popular products, including Pocket 3, Action 4, DJI Mini 3, etc., with discounts up to 1478 yuan. 据此前报道，大疆宣布将在 10 月 9 日开启双十一狂欢，多款热门产品降价，包含 Pocket 3、Action 4、DJI Mini 3 等，最高优惠达 1478 元。

After the news was announced, "DJI's price drop announcement leads to returns and rights protection for consumers who already purchased" quickly became a trending topic on Weibo, with many consumers seeking refunds for price differences due to recent purchases of related products. 消息公布后，「大疆预告降价已购买消费者退货维权」迅速登上微博热搜，不少消费者因刚购入相关产品而维权退差价。

item.title: 分析师曝折叠 iPhone 关键零部件最新进展，立讯为潜在供应商
item.guid: 分析师曝折叠-iPhone-关键零部件最新进展，立讯为潜在供应商
item.description:
Tianfeng International Securities analyst Ming-Chi Kuo's latest report indicates that the unit price of foldable iPhone hinges is expected to be only 70-80 US dollars after mass production, significantly lower than the market's previous general expectation of over 100-120 US dollars. 天风国际证券分析师郭明錤最新报告指出，折叠 iPhone 的铰链（Hinge）在量产后的单价预计仅为 70–80 美元，远低于市场此前普遍预期的 100–120 美元以上。

At the supply chain level, Hon Hai and Shin Nikko have established a joint venture responsible for receiving orders and producing foldable iPhone hinges. 在供应链层面，鸿海与新日兴已成立合资公司，负责折叠 iPhone 铰链的接单与生产。

Hon Hai holds a slightly higher stake and leads the future development direction, with the joint venture securing approximately 65% of the order share, significantly higher than Amphenol's 35%. 鸿海持股比重略高，并主导未来发展方向，合资公司取得约 65% 的订单份额，明显高于安费诺（Amphenol）的 35%。

Luxshare is considered a potential supplier, possibly joining as early as after 2027, laying the groundwork for future market competition. 立讯则被视为潜在供应商，最快可能在 2027 年后加入，为未来市场竞争埋下伏笔。

Ming-Chi Kuo believes that the main reason for the decline in hinge unit price is the optimization of assembly design and Hon Hai's participation, rather than a significant drop in upstream component costs. 郭明錤认为，铰链单价下降的主要原因在于组装设计优化与鸿海的参与，而非上游零组件成本大幅下跌。

Hon Hai not only enters the hinge business through this but also strengthens its vertical integration advantage with its assembly business. In contrast, while Shin Nikko is a joint venture partner, its actual benefits are limited, and market expectations for its contribution may have been overly optimistic. 鸿海借此不仅切入铰链业务，还能强化与组装业务的垂直整合优势。相比之下，新日兴虽为合资方，但实际受益有限，市场此前对其贡献的预期可能过于乐观。

Due to not actively cooperating with Apple's expansion plans, Amphenol has a limited order share for foldable iPhone hinges and may shift its focus to more growth-oriented businesses like AI in the future. 由于未积极配合苹果的扩产计划，安费诺在折叠 iPhone 铰链上的订单份额有限，未来可能把重心转向 AI 等更具成长性的业务。

Overall, the unit price of foldable iPhone hinges is significantly lower than expected, the supply chain landscape is being reshaped, Hon Hai has become the biggest beneficiary, and Luxshare's potential entry means future competition will further intensify. 整体来看，折叠 iPhone 铰链的单价显著低于预期，供应链格局正在重塑，鸿海成为最大受益者，而立讯的潜在加入则意味着未来竞争将进一步加剧。

item.title: 大疆 Pocket 3「平替」登陆亚马逊，售价仅 499 美元
item.guid: 大疆-Pocket-3「平替」登陆亚马逊，售价仅-499-美元
item.description:
According to The Verge, a US company named Xtra Technology has recently attracted attention. 据 The Verge 报道，一家名为 Xtra Technology 的美国公司近日引发关注。

The company's "Xtra Muse" camera, sold on Amazon, is almost identical to the DJI Osmo Pocket 3 but is priced as low as $499 (approximately 3550 RMB), significantly lower than the $799 price point in the US market after tariff increases. 该公司在亚马逊平台上销售的「Xtra Muse」相机，与大疆 Osmo Pocket 3 几乎完全一致，但售价却低至 499 美元（约 3550 元人民币），远低于美国市场上因关税上涨后的 799 美元定价。

The report points out that Xtra's products are not only highly similar to DJI cameras in appearance and function, but even FCC teardown reports show that their internal circuit boards and chips are identical to DJI's. 报道指出，Xtra 所售产品不仅在外观和功能上与大疆相机高度相似，甚至在 FCC 拆解报告中显示其内部电路板、芯片与大疆完全相同。

Furthermore, Xtra's software contains numerous traces of code directly copied from DJI, with only the "DJI" text replaced by other names. 此外，Xtra 的软件中存在大量直接复制自大疆代码的痕迹，仅将「DJI」字样替换为其他名称。

Notably, when asked about its relationship with Xtra, DJI did not explicitly deny it, only stating "no comment." It is widely suspected that Xtra might be a shell company established by DJI to circumvent US tariffs and potential bans. 值得注意的是，大疆在被问及与 Xtra 的关系时，并未明确否认，仅表示「不予置评」。外界普遍怀疑，Xtra 或是大疆为规避美国关税和潜在禁令而设立的壳公司。

Public records show that Xtra was established in March 2025 and completed trademark applications, FCC certifications, and product listings within a few months. 公开资料显示，Xtra 于 2025 年 3 月成立，并在数月内完成商标申请、FCC 认证及产品上架。

item.title: 满帮集团内部发文：取消周六「奋斗日」实现双休
item.guid: 满帮集团内部发文：取消周六「奋斗日」实现双休
item.description:
Sina Tech, citing informed sources, reported that Manbang Group, a smart logistics ecosystem platform, recently issued an internal announcement stating the cancellation of its previously implemented "Struggle Day" system. Employees will now be able to rest normally on the last Saturday of each month, achieving a two-day weekend. 新浪科技援引知情人士报道，智慧物流生态平台满帮集团近日在内部发文宣布，取消此前实行的「奋斗日」制度，今后员工可在每月最后一个周六正常休息，实现双休。

The notice emphasized that this move does not mean weakening the "spirit of struggle." The company stated that in the face of fierce market competition, it still needs to maintain a fighting spirit and fully commit to creating value. 通知中强调，此举并不意味着弱化「奋斗精神」。公司表示，面对激烈的市场竞争，仍需保持拼搏意识，全力投入创造价值。

It is understood that Manbang Group previously designated the last Saturday of each month as a "Struggle Day," requiring employees to work normally. This adjustment is seen as an important measure by the company to address employee needs and optimize the work experience. 据悉，满帮集团此前将每月月末的周六设为「奋斗日」，要求员工正常上班。此次调整被视为公司关注员工需求、优化工作体验的重要举措。

The internal notice stated: "We hope everyone takes this opportunity to improve daily work efficiency, transform the positive effects of the system adjustment into actual business results, and achieve self-growth through efficient work. Any system iteration needs to adapt to different development stages, and continuous optimization is the norm." 内部通知指出：「希望大家以此为契机，提升日常工作效率，将制度调整的积极效应转化为实际业务成果，在高效工作中获得自我成长。任何制度迭代都需适配不同发展阶段，持续调优是常态。」

Additionally, at the beginning of the year, there were rumors that Manbang Group planned a secondary listing in Hong Kong, but company insiders responded that there are currently no such plans. They will continue to monitor market conditions and business development to evaluate the possibility of a dual listing in the future. 此外，市场年初曾传出满帮集团计划赴港二次上市的消息，但公司内部人士回应称，目前暂无相关计划，将持续关注市场环境与业务发展，评估未来是否考虑两地上市的可能性。

item.title: 澳洲一大学 AI 检测出错，近 6000 学生遭误判学术不端
item.guid: 澳洲一大学-AI-检测出错，近-6000-学生遭误判学术不端
item.description:
According to Australian media ABC News, Australian Catholic University (ACU) registered nearly 6,000 cases of academic misconduct in 2024, with approximately 90% involving AI use. However, several students stated that they were wrongly accused without violating any rules, leading to severe impacts on their academic careers and employment. 据澳媒 ABC News 报道，澳大利亚天主教大学（ACU）在 2024 年登记了近 6000 起学术不端案件，其中约 90% 涉及 AI 使用。但多名学生表示，他们在没有违规的情况下被错误指控，导致学业和就业受到严重影响。

Madeleine, a nursing student, received an email from the university during her graduation internship and job search, accusing her of using AI to complete assignments. 一名护理专业学生 Madeleine 在毕业实习和求职期间收到校方邮件，被指控使用 AI 完成作业。

She stated, "I was already very anxious at the time, and then I had to face an additional academic misconduct investigation." 她称「当时已经很焦虑了，还要额外面对学术不端调查」。

She was eventually cleared six months later, but her transcript long showed "results withheld," affecting her job prospects. 最终她在半年后被澄清，但成绩单长期显示「成绩被扣留（results withheld）」，影响了她的求职机会。

University Vice-Chancellor Tania Broadley stated that the figures circulating externally "have been greatly exaggerated," but admitted that there was indeed an increase in academic misconduct reports last year. 校方副校长 Tania Broadley 表示，外界流传的数字「被大幅夸大」，但承认去年确实出现了学术不端举报数量上升。

She revealed that "about half of the confirmed violation cases involved unauthorized AI use," including AI-generated assignments, references, and rewritten or translated content. However, she emphasized that "any case relying solely on the Turnitin AI detection tool as the only evidence has been dismissed." 她透露「约一半确认违规的案例涉及未经授权的 AI 使用」，包括 AI 生成的作业、参考文献以及改写或翻译内容。不过，她强调「任何仅依赖 Turnitin AI 检测工具作为唯一证据的案件均已被驳回」。

Several students reported that the university required them to submit materials such as handwritten notes and search records to prove their innocence. Investigations often took several months, during which their grades were withheld, even affecting graduation and employment. 多名学生反映，校方要求他们提交手写笔记、搜索记录等材料以证明清白，调查往往耗时数月，期间成绩被扣留，甚至影响毕业和就业。

Some students claimed that "almost the entire paper was flagged as AI-generated by the detection tool," but the university lacked further evidence. 部分学生称「几乎整篇论文都被检测工具标记为 AI 生成」，但校方缺乏进一步证据。

It is understood that ACU stopped using Turnitin's AI detection tool in March this year due to concerns about its accuracy. The company had previously warned on its official website that AI reports "may misjudge" and should not be used as the sole basis. 据了解，ACU 已在今年 3 月放弃使用 Turnitin 的 AI 检测工具，原因是其准确性存在问题。该公司此前也在官网提示，AI 报告「可能误判」，不应作为唯一依据。

Education experts point out that simply banning AI is not the solution. Professor Danny Liu of the University of Sydney stated, "Academics are teachers, not police," and schools should teach students how to use AI correctly, rather than simply punishing them. He emphasized that "the real question is whether students are learning, not whether they are cheating." 教育专家指出，单纯禁止 AI 并非解决之道。悉尼大学教授 Danny Liu 表示「学者是教师，而不是警察」，学校应当教授学生如何正确使用 AI，而不是一味惩罚。他强调「真正的问题是学生是否在学习，而不是是否在作弊」。

item.title: 前瑞银宏观分析师：AI 泡沫规模是互联网泡沫的 17 倍、「次贷危机」的 4 倍
item.guid: 前瑞银宏观分析师：AI-泡沫规模是互联网泡沫的-17-倍、「次贷危机」的-4-倍
item.description:
Independent research firm MacroStrategy Partnership warned in its latest report that the current AI investment frenzy has far surpassed several famous historical bubbles. Analyst Julien Garran pointed out that the scale of the AI bubble is 17 times that of the "dot-com bubble" and even 4 times that of the "subprime mortgage crisis." 独立研究机构 MacroStrategy Partnership 在最新报告中警告称，当前的人工智能投资热潮已远超历史上多次著名泡沫。分析师 Julien Garran 指出，AI 泡沫规模是「互联网泡沫」的 17 倍，甚至是「次贷危机」的 4 倍。

The report states that over the past decade, the Federal Reserve's quantitative easing policies and low-interest-rate environment led to a massive misallocation of capital to areas such as AI, real estate, NFTs, and venture capital. As the interest rate environment returns to normal, market risks are gradually emerging. 报告称，过去十余年美联储的量化宽松政策和低利率环境，导致资本被大规模误配至 AI、房地产、NFT 及风险投资等领域。随着利率环境回归正常，市场风险逐渐显现。

Garran also stated bluntly that large language models have reached their "scaling limits." For example, the training cost of GPT-3 was about $50 million, GPT-4 rose to $500 million, and GPT-5 cost $5 billion, but the performance improvement was not significant. Garran 还直言，大型语言模型已触及「规模极限」。例如，GPT-3 的训练成本约为 5000 万美元，GPT-4 升至 5 亿美元，而 GPT-5 则耗资 50 亿美元，但性能提升并不显著。

He believes that this trend of "exponentially increasing input and diminishing marginal returns" means the AI industry lacks long-term moats. 他认为，这种「投入指数级增加、回报边际递减」的趋势，意味着 AI 行业缺乏长期护城河。

Furthermore, the report points out that AI adoption rates in enterprises have declined, with some test cases showing models completing complex tasks at less than 34%. 此外，报告指出，AI 在企业中的采用率已出现下滑，部分测试案例显示模型在复杂任务上的完成率不足 34%。

In Garran's view, as data center investments and wealth effects peak and reverse, the U.S. economy may repeat the recession that followed the dot-com bubble burst in 2001. 在 Garran 看来，随着数据中心投资和财富效应的见顶并反转，美国经济可能重演 2001 年互联网泡沫破裂后的衰退。

He warned that this could lead to a "zone 4 recession / deflationary bust," a trend that would be difficult to reverse even if the Federal Reserve or government attempted stimulus policies. In such a scenario, overall market valuations could fall sharply, with tech/AI companies bearing the brunt. 他警告，这可能导致 「zone 4 衰退 / 通缩性崩盘（deflationary bust）」的出现，即使美联储或政府尝试通过刺激政策也难以轻易扭转趋势。在这种情况下，整体市场估值可能大幅下跌，技术 / AI 公司首当其冲。

item.title: 极星关闭国内最后一家直营门店：转向线上销售模式
item.guid: 极星关闭国内最后一家直营门店：转向线上销售模式
item.description:
According to Jiemian News, Polestar has closed its last directly operated store in China, located at Shanghai Qiantan L+Plaza. 据界面新闻报道，极星汽车（Polestar）已关闭其在国内的最后一家直营门店，该门店位于上海前滩 L+Plaza。

It is reported that Polestar responded, stating that this move is a strategic adjustment to better align with the diverse and rapidly changing consumer demands of the Chinese market. 据悉，极星方面回应称，此举是出于战略性调整，以更好地契合中国市场多样化、快速变化的消费需求。

Polestar China stated: "Although the Shanghai store has been temporarily closed, Polestar's other operations in China remain unaffected, and car owners' rights will not be impacted in any way." 极星中国方面表示：「虽然暂时关闭了上海的门店，但极星在中国的其他业务均不受影响，车主的权益也不会受到任何影响。」

Currently, Polestar primarily adopts an online sales model in China, allowing users to complete vehicle purchases and after-sales services through official channels. 目前，极星在国内主要采取线上销售模式，用户可通过官方渠道完成购车及售后相关服务。

item.title: 💡 斯坦福学者：AI 为博取社交媒体点赞会变得「反社会化」
item.guid: 💡-斯坦福学者：AI-为博取社交媒体点赞会变得「反社会化」
item.description:
According to Futurism, a new Stanford University paper points out that when AI models are rewarded with interaction metrics like "likes" in a social media environment, they gradually exhibit "antisocial" tendencies. 据 Futurism 报道，斯坦福大学最新论文指出，当人工智能模型在社交媒体环境中被奖励「点赞」等互动指标时，会逐渐表现出「反社会化」倾向。

The research team tested various AI models, including Alibaba Cloud's Qwen and Meta's Llama, in three simulated scenarios: elections, product sales, and social media. The results showed that even with safeguards in place, models still exhibited distortion and inappropriate behavior due to competition. 研究团队在模拟选举、商品销售和社交媒体三类场景中测试了多种 AI 模型，包括阿里云的 Qwen 和 Meta 的 Llama，结果显示即便设置了防护措施，模型仍会因竞争而出现失真和不当行为。

James Zou, co-author of the paper and a Stanford University professor, posted on the X platform: "When large models compete for social media likes, they start fabricating content; when they compete for votes, they become inflammatory and populist." 论文共同作者、斯坦福大学教授 James Zou 在 X 平台发文称：「当大模型为了社交媒体点赞而竞争时，它们会开始编造内容；当它们为了选票竞争时，就会变得煽动和民粹化。」

The research team refers to this phenomenon as "AI's Moloch Deal," meaning that individuals continuously optimize their goals in competition, but ultimately everyone loses the overall situation. 研究团队将这一现象称为「AI 的摩洛克交易」，意指个体在竞争中不断优化目标，但最终所有人都输掉了整体局面。

Specific data shows that in simulated sales scenarios, while sales increased by 6.3%, deceptive marketing rose by 14%; in simulated elections, vote share increased by 4.9%, but misinformation surged by 22.3%, and populist rhetoric by 12.5%; in social media scenarios, interaction volume increased by 7.5%, but was accompanied by a 188.6% surge in misinformation and a 16.3% increase in the promotion of harmful behaviors. 具体数据表明，在模拟销售场景中，销售额提升 6.3% 的同时，欺骗性营销增加了 14%；在模拟选举中，选票份额提升 4.9%，但虚假信息增加了 22.3%，民粹化言论增加了 12.5%；在社交媒体场景中，互动量提升 7.5%，却伴随虚假信息激增 188.6%，有害行为推广增加 16.3%。

Researchers warn that existing safeguards are insufficient to prevent AI from exhibiting distorted behavior in competitive environments, and "significant social costs may follow." This finding highlights the potential ethical and safety risks when AI is widely applied in social media, business, and political scenarios. 研究人员警告称，现有的防护措施不足以阻止 AI 在竞争环境中出现失真行为，「显著的社会成本可能随之而来」。这一发现凸显了在 AI 广泛应用于社交媒体、商业和政治场景时，潜在的伦理与安全风险。

item.title: 4399 元起，vivo X300 系列正式发布，相机按键取消
item.guid: 4399-元起，vivo-X300-系列正式发布，相机按键取消
item.description:
Last night, vivo officially released the X300 series, including the X300 and X300 Pro. All new products are equipped with the Dimensity 9500 flagship chip, support USB 3.2, dual speakers, ultrasonic fingerprint, and all models support the vivo Zeiss 2.35x telephoto extender, pre-installed with OriginOS 6. 昨晚，vivo 正式发布了 X300 系列，包含 X300 和 X300 Pro，新品全系搭载天玑 9500 旗舰芯片，支持 USB 3.2、双扬声器、超声波指纹，全系支持 vivo 蔡司 2.35x 长焦增距镜，并预装 OriginOS 6。

In terms of imaging, both series are equipped with a Zeiss 200-megapixel imaging system, full-focal-length zoom flash, and support multi-focal-length 4K 120fps Dolby Vision video recording. The body features a metal frame and velvet glass craftsmanship. 影像方面，系列均配备蔡司 2 亿像素影像系统、全焦段变焦闪光灯，支持多焦段 4K 120fps 杜比视界视频录制。机身采用金属中框与丝绒玻璃工艺。

The vivo X300 is an upgraded version of the X200 Pro mini, positioned as a lightweight, small-screen imaging flagship, with the main highlights as follows: vivo X300 是 X200 Pro mini 的升级版，定位轻薄小屏影像旗舰，主要亮点如下：

item.title: 谷歌 Gemini 3.0 全家桶曝光：一句话生成网页、游戏与音乐
item.guid: 谷歌-Gemini-3.0-全家桶曝光：一句话生成网页、游戏与音乐
item.description:
Google is about to release its next-generation flagship large model, Gemini 3.0 "family bucket," which is considered the grand finale in the AI field this year. Multiple developers have already demonstrated its powerful capabilities in internal testing: a single sentence can generate web pages, games, and even original music, potentially completely disrupting front-end development. 谷歌即将发布新一代旗舰大模型 Gemini 3.0「全家桶」，被视为今年 AI 领域的压轴大戏。多位开发者已在内测中展示了其强大能力：一句话即可生成网页、游戏乃至原创音乐，前端开发或将彻底被颠覆。

According to multiple sources, Gemini 3.0 is expected to officially debut on October 22. 据多方爆料，Gemini 3.0 预计将在 10 月 22 日正式亮相。

Internal leaked information shows that the series includes Gemini 3.0 Pro, Gemini 3.0 Flash, and the more advanced Gemini 3.0 Ultra versions. 内部泄露信息显示，该系列包含 Gemini 3.0 Pro、Gemini 3.0 Flash，以及更高阶的 Gemini 3.0 Ultra 版本。

The model adopts an MoE architecture, with a parameter scale exceeding a trillion. Each call can activate 15 to 20 billion parameters, and the context window has leaped from 1 million to several million tokens, capable of processing entire books and large codebases. 模型采用 MoE 架构，参数规模突破万亿，每次调用可激活 150～200 亿参数，上下文窗口更是从 100 万跃升至数百万 token，能够处理整本书籍和大型代码库。

In internal testing demonstrations, Gemini 3.0 showcased astonishing front-end generation capabilities: 在内测演示中，Gemini 3.0 展现了惊人的前端生成能力：

    One-click generation of complete web pages and complex fractal animations;

    Achieved success in one go in game tests such as "Space Invaders" and "Castle Defense";

    Can even turn the classic test of "pelican riding a bicycle" into a 3D pixel art version;

    Users can generate original piano pieces with a single sentence, featuring passionate and surging melodies.

Some developers frankly stated that "front-end development has been conquered by Gemini 3.0," with the only concern being whether its features will be weakened upon official release. 有开发者直言「前端开发已被 Gemini 3.0 攻陷」，唯一的担忧是正式发布时功能是否会被削弱。

item.title: 19.99 万元起，风云 T11 正式开启预售
item.guid: 19.99-万元起，风云-T11-正式开启预售
item.description:
Yesterday, the Fengyun brand's first flagship SUV, the Fengyun T11, successfully held its family appreciation day and pre-sale launch event in Wuhu, Anhui. Positioned as a "smart six-seater flagship SUV," the new car launched 4 models with pre-sale prices ranging from 199,900 to 264,900 yuan. 昨天，风云品牌首款旗舰级 SUV —— 风云 T11 在安徽芜湖成功举行家庭品鉴日暨预售发布会，新车定位「智享大六座旗舰 SUV」，共推出 4 款车型，预售价区间为 19.99 万元至 26.49 万元。

    220 Rear-wheel drive Boya Giant Screen Luxury Edition: 199,900 yuan

    220 Rear-wheel drive Dual IMAX Cinema Edition: 219,900 yuan

    220 Four-wheel drive Dual IMAX Cinema Edition: 243,900 yuan

    220 4WD Family Package: 264,900 yuan

The official announcement states that users who place an order can enjoy six major gifts worth up to 66,800 yuan, including the Boya Audio 23-speaker panoramic sound system, zero-gravity seats, 21-inch wheels + Michelin silent tires, electric side step deduction coupons, custom paint, and a financial plan (up to 150,000 yuan with 0 interest for 3 years). 官方宣布，锁单用户可享价值至高 66800 元的六重礼，包括伯牙之音 23 扬声器全景声系统、零重力座椅、21 吋轮毂+米其林静音轮胎、电动侧踏抵扣券、高定车漆及金融方案（至高 15 万 3 年 0 息）。

The Fengyun T11 has body dimensions of 5205×1998×1800mm and a wheelbase of 3120mm. It offers second-row zero-gravity seats, third-row electric seats, and 798L of trunk space. It supports voice-activated expansion into a 1.8m large bed, meeting the needs for family travel and camping. 风云 T11 车身尺寸为 5205×1998×1800mm，轴距 3120mm，提供二排零重力座椅、三排电动座椅及 798L 后备箱空间，支持语音拓展 1.8m 大床，满足家庭出行与露营需求。

In terms of power, the Fengyun T11 is equipped with the Golden Range Extender CEM, offering a comprehensive range of 1400km. Coupled with a maglev chassis and Snow Leopard intelligent four-wheel drive, it caters to both urban and outdoor scenarios. The cabin features a 30-inch integrated panoramic screen, a 17.3-inch rear entertainment screen, and a 9.2L hot/cold refrigerator, creating an immersive luxury experience. 动力方面，风云 T11 搭载黄金增程 CEM，综合续航达 1400km，配合磁悬浮底盘与雪豹智能四驱，兼顾城市与户外场景。座舱配备 30 吋一体寰宇屏、17.3 吋后舱娱乐屏及 9.2L 冷暖冰箱，营造沉浸式豪华体验。

In terms of intelligence, the new car is equipped with Falcon advanced assisted driving, supporting high-speed NOA, urban NOA, and cross-floor memory parking. The Falcon 500 system is standard across all models. The voice assistant "Xiaoqi Tongxue" supports dialect recognition and full-vehicle voice control, further enhancing the in-car entertainment functions. 智能化方面，新车搭载猎鹰高阶辅助驾驶，支持高速 NOA、城市 NOA 与跨楼层记忆泊车，全系标配猎鹰 500 系统。语音助手「小奇同学」支持方言识别与全车语音控制，车机娱乐功能进一步增强。

The official statement indicates that the Fengyun T11, based on the concept of "luxury from entry," comes standard with 11 million-level configurations across all models, aiming to set a new benchmark for family six-seater SUVs. 官方表示，风云 T11 以「入门即豪华」为理念，全系标配 11 项百万级配置，力图树立家庭六座 SUV 新标杆。

item.title: 上海迪士尼携手 vivo 推出园区影像互动体验
item.guid: 上海迪士尼携手-vivo-推出园区影像互动体验
item.description:
Yesterday, Shanghai Disney Resort officially announced on its WeChat public account that it has formed a strategic alliance with vivo. 昨天，上海迪士尼度假区官方在微信公众号发文，宣布与 vivo 宣布达成战略联盟。

According to the introduction, vivo will become an official partner of Shanghai Disney Resort and will launch multiple imaging interactive experiences within the park. 据介绍，vivo 将成为上海迪士尼度假区官方合作伙伴，并在园区内推出多项影像互动体验。

As part of the collaboration, vivo will set up 5 brand interactive photo spots within the park, covering popular attractions such as the Enchanted Storybook Castle, offering visitors multi-angle shooting recommendations. 作为合作的一部分，vivo 将在乐园内设置 5 个品牌互动拍照点，覆盖奇幻童话城堡等热门景点，为游客提供多角度拍摄推荐。

Visitors using vivo phones can also unlock limited-time digital experiences, including themed digital photo frames, AR photo filters, and Disney-themed wallpapers. 使用 vivo 手机的游客还可解锁限时数字体验，包括主题电子相框、AR 照片滤镜以及迪士尼主题壁纸。

Furthermore, starting from mid-October 2025, a special interactive experience space for vivo phones will be open for a limited time in Disneytown, where visitors can experience the imaging capabilities of the X300 series firsthand and capture night performances such as the "Dream of Light Phantom Show." 此外，自 2025 年 10 月中旬起，vivo 手机特别互动体验空间将在迪士尼小镇限时开放，游客可现场体验 X300 系列的影像功能，拍摄「奇梦之光幻影秀」等夜间演出。

The official statement indicates that this collaboration aims to help visitors better record wonderful moments with their family and friends in the park. 官方表示，此次合作旨在帮助游客更好地记录与亲友在园区的美好瞬间。

item.title: 京东自营「七鲜小厨」入驻美团
item.guid: 京东自营「七鲜小厨」入驻美团
item.description:
According to e-commerce news outlet Dian Shang Pai, JD.com's self-operated takeaway store "7FRESH Kitchen" has officially launched on the Meituan App. Concurrently, JD.com's newly introduced independent brand "7FRESH Coffee" has also debuted on Meituan. 据电商派报道，京东自营外卖门店「七鲜小厨」已正式上线美团 App。同时，京东新推出的独立品牌「七鲜咖啡」也同步登陆美团。

Information shows that JD.com's first "7FRESH Kitchen" self-operated takeaway store opened on July 20, adopting a "takeaway + self-pickup" model with no dine-in service. 资料显示，京东首家「七鲜小厨」外卖自营门店于 7 月 20 日开业，采取「外卖 + 自提」模式，不设堂食。

Currently, the Meituan platform shows that the store is located in Dongcheng District, Beijing, offering only self-pickup and takeaway services. Single meals are priced at just over twenty yuan, with several drink options available for under ten yuan. 目前，美团平台显示，该门店位于北京东城区，仅提供自提外带服务，单人餐价格在二十多元，另有多款十元以下饮品可选。

Previously, "7FRESH Kitchen" had already joined JD.com's takeaway channel, and has now expanded to Meituan, but has not yet launched on Taobao Flash Sale or Ele.me. 此前，「七鲜小厨」已入驻京东外卖频道，如今扩展至美团，但暂未上线淘宝闪购或饿了么。

item.title: 喜茶再推跨界新品，「燃·莫吉托喜拉朵」上线广州深圳
item.guid: 喜茶再推跨界新品，「燃·莫吉托喜拉朵」上线广州深圳
item.description:
Recently, Heytea collaborated with celebrity chef Ran Shao from the food variety show "Yi Fan Feng Shen" to launch a limited-edition new product, "Ran Mojito Xiladuo." The new product infuses Mojito flavor into the Xiladuo product, offering a refreshing and unique taste. 近日，喜茶携手美食综艺《一饭封神》明星大厨燃少，推出限定新品「燃·莫吉托喜拉朵」。新品将莫吉托风味融入喜拉朵产品中，带来清新独特的口感。

On the launch day, Ran Shao appeared as an "inspiration friend" at the Guangzhou Tianhuan Plaza LAB store, participating in the "Inspiration Tea Party" event. He not only personally crafted the new product but also prepared a special Mojito blend with Green Yan tea on-site, recreating the famous "Mojito Immortal" scene from the show and sharing his culinary insights with the audience. 上线当天，燃少以「灵感好友」身份现身广州天环广场 LAB 店，参与「灵感茶话会」活动。他不仅亲手制作新品，还现场调制加入绿妍茶汤的莫吉托特调，重现节目中的「莫吉托仙人」名场面，并与观众分享美食心得。

It is reported that this new product will be simultaneously launched at the Guangzhou Tianhuan Plaza LAB store and the Shenzhen Happy Coast LAB store, available for a limited sale period of one month. 据悉，本次新品同步上线广州天环广场 LAB 店与深圳欢乐海岸 LAB 店，限时销售一个月。

The new product uses Xiladuo's creamy milk fragrance as its base, blending fresh mint, lemon zest, and Green Yan tea soup to create a sweet, smooth, refreshing, and clear taste. Additionally, the brand has launched a slightly alcoholic version with white rum, catering to consumers' diverse preferences for Mojito flavors. 新品以喜拉朵的绵密奶香为基底，融合新鲜薄荷、柠檬皮碎与绿妍茶汤，打造香甜柔滑又清凉通透的口感。同时，品牌还推出添加白朗姆酒的微醺版本，满足消费者对莫吉托风味的多样需求。

In this collaboration, Heytea designed a series of visual materials and merchandise for Ran Shao, including insert cards, cup stickers, regular stickers, refrigerator magnets, etc., combining his classic image from the show to strengthen fan interaction and brand memory points. 在合作中，喜茶为燃少设计了系列视觉物料与周边，包括插卡、杯贴、贴纸、冰箱贴等，结合其在节目中的经典形象，强化粉丝互动与品牌记忆点。

Since the beginning of this year, Heytea has successively collaborated with Michelin chef Li Zian, new-generation chef Ran Shao, and artist Yi Hui, continuously expanding brand experience through new products, exhibitions, and merchandise. 今年以来，喜茶已先后与米其林大厨黎子安、新生代大厨燃少及艺术家易辉等展开合作，持续通过新品、展览与周边形式拓展品牌体验。

item.title: 山姆下架商品现身好特卖：99.9 元零食折扣价仅 39.9 元
item.guid: 山姆下架商品现身好特卖：99.9-元零食折扣价仅-39.9-元
item.description:
Sam's Club recently sparked heated discussion due to 'delisted products quickly appearing in discount channels'. 山姆会员商店近期因「下架商品快速出现在折扣渠道」引发热议。

According to multiple reports, some snacks sold at Sam's for 99.9 yuan were only 39.9 yuan in Hot Sale channels, nearly halving the price difference, leading many consumers to exclaim they felt 'stabbed in the back'. 根据多方报道，部分在山姆售价 99.9 元的零食，在好特卖渠道仅售 39.9 元，差价近乎腰斩，令不少消费者直呼「被背刺」。

Some consumers stated that products they had just purchased at full price in mid-September were seen selling at half price on discount platforms less than a week later, without any price notification, making them feel the 'price difference was disgusting'. Related complaints on social media continued to escalate, and the topic even trended. 有消费者表示，自己刚在 9 月中旬以原价购买的商品，不到一周便在折扣平台看到半价销售，且未收到任何价格提示，感到「差价太恶心」。社交平台上相关吐槽不断发酵，话题一度冲上热搜。

Industry insiders pointed out that it is a common business practice for retailers to divert delisted products to clearance channels, but the key to this controversy lies in the 'excessive speed'. 业内人士指出，零售商将下架商品流向尾盘渠道本属常见商业行为，但此次争议的关键在于「速度过快」。

Products transitioned almost seamlessly from Sam's shelves to discount platforms, eroding consumer trust in 'quality screening'. 商品几乎无缝衔接地从山姆货架转入折扣平台，打破了消费者对「品质筛选」的信任感。

For a long time, Sam's has shaped a brand perception of 'quality living' through its combined strategy of 'high-threshold membership + strictly selected products + large packaging'. 长期以来，山姆凭借「高门槛会员制 + 严选品 + 大包装」的组合策略，塑造了「品质生活」的品牌心智。

However, with the introduction of lower-priced branded products and the rapid flow of clearance items to the discount market, some members have begun to question its product selection standards and pricing logic. 然而，随着低价品牌商品的引入，以及尾盘商品快速流向折扣市场，部分会员开始质疑其选品标准与定价逻辑。

item.title: 纪录片《成为大师》定档 10 月 18 日
item.guid: 纪录片《成为大师》定档-10-月-18-日
item.description:
The documentary film 'Becoming a Master' officially began national pre-sales yesterday, simultaneously releasing a special 'Proof' edition trailer. Directed by Zhao Lin, the film will be released nationwide on October 18th, with a total runtime of 90 minutes. 纪录片电影「成为大师」于昨日正式开启全国预售，并同步发布「证明」版特别预告。影片由赵林执导，将于 10 月 18 日在全国上映，全片时长 90 分钟。

The trailer unfolds with three key themes: 'Choice,' 'Search,' and 'Truth,' showcasing the perseverance and sincerity of the three protagonists, Master Pang, Yifan, and Dongtian, in their pursuit of dreams. The film emphasizes that 'truth is more important than anything,' hoping to document the traces and beliefs of dream-chasers through its imagery. 预告片以「选择」「寻找」「真实」三大关键词展开，展现了庞大师、一凡、冬天三位主人公在追梦过程中的坚持与赤诚。影片强调「真实比什么都重要」，希望通过影像记录下追梦者的痕迹与信念。

Previously, 'Becoming a Master' had already begun its national roadshow after the premiere, with audiences calling the film a 'real-life Moon and Sixpence' and stating that it conveys the spiritual power that 'passion can withstand the long years'. 此前，「成为大师」已在首映礼后开启全国路演，观众评价影片「现实版月亮与六便士」，并称其传递出「热爱能抵岁月漫长」的精神力量。

item.title: 武侠动作片《醉刀客》曝光终极海报
item.guid: 武侠动作片《醉刀客》曝光终极海报
item.description:
Yesterday, the movie 'Drunken Swordsman' released its 'Bloody Blade Jianghu' ultimate poster. This newly unveiled ultimate poster is enveloped in a bloody hue, showcasing a turbulent and violent martial arts world atmosphere. 昨天，电影《醉刀客》发布「血刃江湖」版终极海报，此次曝光的终极海报以血色笼罩全局，展现出腥风血雨的江湖氛围。

It is reported that the film is scheduled for national release on October 18th. Directed by Li Bingyuan, it is positioned as a hard-boiled new wuxia action film, with a runtime of 94 minutes. 据悉，本片定档 10 月 18 日全国上映。影片由李炳渊执导，定位为硬派新武侠动作片，时长 94 分钟。

Director Li Bingyuan stated that the film focuses on the chivalrous spirit of 'washing away injustice with blood,' striving to create an immersive wuxia experience through the combination of action, special effects, and Eastern aesthetics. The 'cold-blooded swordsman' Han Yueren, whom he portrays, will embark on a journey of passionate revenge and justice in the film. 导演李炳渊表示，影片聚焦「血洗不公」的侠义精神，力图通过动作、特效与东方美学的结合，打造沉浸式的武侠体验。他所饰演的「冷血刀客」寒月刃将在片中展开一段热血复仇与正义之旅。

item.title: 沪语电影《菜肉馄饨》发布首支先导预告
item.guid: 沪语电影《菜肉馄饨》发布首支先导预告
item.description:
Yesterday, the Shanghainese dialect film 'Vegetable and Pork Wontons' released its first teaser trailer. The film, themed 'Already Wrapped, Just Waiting to be Cooked,' showcases a rich Shanghai street-life atmosphere. 昨天，沪语电影《菜肉馄饨》发布首支先导预告，影片以「已经包好 就等下锅」为主题，展现浓郁的上海市井气息。

The film is directed by Wu Tiange, with Gu Xiaodong as producer, Jin Ying as screenwriter, starring Zhou Yemang, Pan Hong, Mao Shanyu, Chen Guoqing, Xu Xiang, and with Wang Lin making a special appearance. 影片由吴天戈执导，顾晓东担任制片人，金莹编剧，周野芒、潘虹、茅善玉、陈国庆、徐祥领衔主演，王琳特别出演。

The story unfolds from a bowl of vegetable and pork wontons, narrating the daily life of retired engineer Old Wang (played by Zhou Yemang) as he busies himself with blind dates for his son, connecting the family bonds and human relationships within Shanghai's alleyways. 故事从一碗菜肉馄饨展开，讲述退休工程师老汪（周野芒 饰）为儿子奔波相亲的生活日常，串联起上海弄堂间的亲情与人情。

On October 12th, the film held a light and shadow art appreciation event on the Shanghai Bund. Producer Gu Xiaodong announced that the Sinan Mansions 'Vegetable and Pork Wontons' reception hall would officially open on October 21st. The film is expected to be released in 2025. 10 月 12 日，影片在上海外滩举办光影艺赏会，制片人顾晓东宣布思南公馆「菜肉馄饨」会客厅将于 10 月 21 日正式开业。影片预计于 2025 年上映。
